recipesJson.name: Mixin Vixens- Jarvis - Cheesecake Bites with Banana caramel topping
recipesJson.author: JenniferJarvis
recipesJson.description: With a crust of toasted and crushed cinnamon buns mixed with crush graham crackers and butter, to make the crust. Cheesecake filling. Topped with a banana slice and a light drizzle of cinnamon caramel sauce, this is an easy recipe with yummy results.

pageContext.name: Mixin Vixens- Jarvis - Cheesecake Bites with Banana caramel topping
